content.rendered:
[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” el_class=”page-hero page-hero–secondary” el_id=”page-hero”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” visibility=”visible-phone” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–sm” css=”.vc_custom_1592973436883{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Moula-About-Us-Mobile.jpg?id=19087) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”page-hero__background-image”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” wpex_bg_overlay=”color” visibility=”visible-tablet” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–md” el_class=”page-hero__background-image” css=”.vc_custom_1592973440678{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Moula-About-Us-header.jpg?id=19088) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_overlay_color=”#203543″][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” el_id=”page-hero__background-image–lg” el_class=”page-hero__background-image” css=”.vc_custom_1592973444201{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Moula-About-Us-header.jpg?id=19088) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” visibility=”visible-desktop”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8″ el_class=”col-sm-centered”]

About us

[/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”our-story”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”5/6″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-1 vc_col-md-10 vc_col-sm-offset-1 vc_col-xs-12″]

Our story

[vc_column_text]Moula was founded in 2013 to help hard-working business owners in Australia access the business finance they need to grow. In the past, getting a business loan meant going through weeks of paperwork, hassle, and hurdles. We use data to assess your business loan application, which means we can keep things fast and painless. Our founders are finance industry experts who are passionate about using technology to simplify small business finance and backing good businesses.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”values” css=”.vc_custom_1592887178241{background-color: #f5f6f6 !important;}”][vc_row remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column]

Values

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]Business is personal, and so are our values[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″ equal_height=”yes” el_class=”card-group”][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”card-item” css=”.vc_custom_1592887418729{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”]

We're transparent

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]We’re upfront about who we are and what we offer. We clearly communicate the cost of our business finance products.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”none” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592887422347{padding-top: 2rem !important;padding-right: 2rem !important;padding-bottom: 2rem !important;padding-left: 2rem !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”card-item”]

All business is personal

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]At the core of every business, you’ll always find human dreams and ambitions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1592887425273{padding-top: 2rem !important;padding-right: 2rem !important;padding-bottom: 2rem !important;padding-left: 2rem !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″ el_class=”card-item”]

We sleep well at night

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]We make responsible business lending decisions and we’re open about how we make them.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-sm-offset-2 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1592887428134{padding-top: 2rem !important;padding-right: 2rem !important;padding-bottom: 2rem !important;padding-left: 2rem !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”card-item”]

There is no small business

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]We see good business, not small business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1592887431700{padding-top: 2rem !important;padding-right: 2rem !important;padding-bottom: 2rem !important;padding-left: 2rem !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”card-item”]

We love computers

[vc_column_text text_align=”center”]Computers allow us to understand where our customers and their businesses are at today.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” remove_bottom_col_margin=”true” min_height=”400px” css=”.vc_custom_1592977224197{background-image: url(https://moula.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Moula-Team.jpg?id=19119) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” wpex_bg_position=”center center” el_id=”mini-hero”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”memberships-affiliations” css=”.vc_custom_1592807832842{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″]

Memberships and affiliations

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” remove_bottom_col_margin=”true”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]Member of FinTech Australia, an organisation dedicated to making Australia one of the world’s leading markets for Fintech innovation, adoption and investment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]Member of the Australian Finance Industry Association, the leading industry advocate for Australia’s finance sector. Moula was one of the six original signatories to AFIA’s Code of Lending Practice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”partnerships”][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-offset-2 vc_col-md-8″]

Partnerships

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row visibility=”visible-desktop”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-1 vc_col-lg-10″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row visibility=”visible-tablet”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row visibility=”visible-phone”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
